section: In the event that the parties are unable to agree to an SOW within 2 months following the Effective Date, either party may, in its sole discretion, terminate this Agreement by providing written notice. Once approved, the parties shall use commercially reasonable efforts to diligently implement their respective obligations under the SOW.
explanation: There is an ambiguity in how the parties are expected to act if they cannot agree to an SOW within two months. The text provides that either party may terminate in its sole discretion. This is in contradiction to other clauses in the document that require action in 'good faith' showing misaligned text that will cause issues of enforcement.

section: After Launch Date, 2TheMart will widely promote the Services: (a) To every seller and high bidder through means including, but not limited to, end of auction emails containing links, such that, it shall be possible for the buyer or seller to initiate a Transaction Inquiry with i-Escrow, without having to re-enter all their personal or transaction related information. (b) By adding links to Co-Branded Site in FAQ section of 2TheMart auctions. (c) By adding links to Co-Branded Site on the seller listing pages of 2TheMart auctions. (d) By displaying a text or graphic link to a page containing information about Services on all auction item pages and bidding pages to educate bidders about i-Escrow.
explanation: The language in section 3 is not correctly structured. By using parenthetical letters to create lists within the section, this can cause structural flaws and inconsistencies. It is unclear how each section relates to each other and how the contract will be enforced with language and structural flaws like this.

section: In addition, i-Escrow shall indemnify 2TheMart against any and all claims, losses, costs and expenses, including reasonable attorneys' fees, which 2TheMart may incur as a result of claims in any form by third parties arising from i-Escrow Source: 2THEMART COM INC, 10-12G, 8/26/1999 Content and or the Services provided to Customers.
explanation: The text and wording in this section is not structurally sound. The phrase 'i-Escrow Source: 2THEMART COM INC, 10-12G, 8/26/1999 Content' is not a real phrase and shows a break in the document. The text is not clear about what liability i-Escrow takes with its content in relation to claims, loses, and costs, especially because this sentence is broken and does not end well. This structural flaw will cause legal problems of enforcement.
